1: I ate a clock yesterday, it was very time-consuming.
2: I can not believe I got fired from the calendar factory. All I did was take a day off!
3: I went to see the doctor about my short-term memory problems. The first thing he did was make me pay in advance.
4: Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation towards the local swimming pool. I gave him a glass of water.
5: Most people are shocked when they find out how bad I am as an electrician.
6: I am reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down.
7: What is the best thing about living in Switzerland? Well, the flag is a big plus.
8: The future, the present, and the past walked into a bar. Things got a little tense.
9: I just found out that I am colorblind. The diagnosis came completely out of the purple.
10: I bought some shoes from a drug dealer. I do not know what he laced them with, but I have been tripping all day.
11: My boss is going to fire the employee with the worst posture. I have a hunch, it might be me.
12: I started out with nothing, and I still have most of it.
13: Smoking will kill you, bacon will kill you, and yet, smoking bacon will cure it.
14: I was addicted to the hokey pokey, but thankfully, I turned myself around.
15: I like to hold hands at the movies, which always seems to startle strangers.
16: Keep the dream alive. Hit your snooze button.
17: The other day I asked the banker to check my balance, so she pushed me.
18: I doubt, therefore, I might be.
19: I used to have a handle on life, but then it broke.
